titles.title: A bill to confer jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to render judgment upon the claim of John King, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/3/1987--Introduced. Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to render judgment upon the claim of a named individual that he was denied a specified promotion in the Navy as a probable consequence of improper and inequitable actions within the Department of the Navy.
